tileset = "temple_FIRE";
area = "Temple_FIRE_SE";
areaname = "Fire Temple";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "FireTemple";
A_sprites = [{name:"Ruby Keystone",model:"object",x:14,y:17,type:"switch_orb",colour:"ruby",base:"gold",conv_action:1},{name:"Soul Cage",model:"examine",x:5,y:26,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_flamesouls"},{name:"EXIT",model:"DOOR12",x:3,y:2,dir:"s",dest:["Temple_FIRE_hub",17,12]}];
var _doneThis = false;
var d = 0;
while(d < GameData.plotVars.FireTempleTest.DONE.length)
{
   if(GameData.plotVars.FireTempleTest.DONE[d] == area)
   {
      _doneThis = true;
   }
   d++;
}
if(GameData.plotVars.SAVIOURS_CH3 === 1 && !_doneThis)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Bernard",model:"bernard",x:6,y:27,walkspeed:-1,dir:"w",elem:"DARK",conv:"c_Saviours"});
}
